entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bella Bella
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bella Bella Airport 8:44 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 through mainland inlets and valleys late this evening and overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
